channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NH
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NH

item.title: Report X-2024010366
item.description:
Report X-2024010366

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-16T18:13:17+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-06
  • City: NASHUA
  • State: NH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PRELOADER NOTICED WET BOTTOM OF HAZMAT PACKAGE. RESPONDER CALLED, PACKAGE ISOLATED AND RETURNED TO RESPONDER CAGE FOR INSPECTION. DEFECTIV CAP DISCOVERED ON INNER CONTAINER.

item.title: Report X-2023121093
item.description:
Report X-2023121093

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-16T18:13:17+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-19
  • City: LONDONDERRY
  • State: NH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: The shipment was damaged during loading/unloading. The fiberboard box was dropped/handled incorrectly causing the package to be torn or punctured. The inner packaging was a Styrofoam box that was also cracked and allowed the Dry Ice to escape the packaging. The product was not damaged. The shipment was held pending disposition from the shipper.
